survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from attendees of professional networking events to improve future events and better meet participants' expectations.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall organization of the networking event?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction questions to capture nuanced responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall organization of the networking event?

questions.question_text: Which aspects of the event did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify high-value components of the event.
questions.scripter_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection and include an 'Other' option with an open-text field.

script.question_text: Which aspects of the event did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please describe any challenges you faced while networking during the event.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended questions can uncover unexpected insights about attendee experiences.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text area for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: Please describe any challenges you faced while networking during the event.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to attend future events organized by the same team?
questions.client_notes: This helps measure loyalty and future engagement potential.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How likely are you to attend future events organized by the same team?

questions.question_text: What additional topics or speakers would you like to see at future events?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended responses can guide content planning for future events.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a text area for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What additional topics or speakers would you like to see at future events?
